title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5203.4 - Security
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5203.4 - Security

State Regulations
(a) Facility
access. (1)

All PSAPs shall be locked and
secured from intrusion. (2)

Access
to a PSAP shall be restricted to authorized persons only. (b) System protection. All PSAPs shall be
equipped with software protection as required by the authority including a
means of access that requires each authorized user to utilize unique
identifiers to enter the systems. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5203.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
